parameters.name: TypeArr
parameters.description: Array of types of entities used to constrain the surface as defined by swSelectType_e ; valid entities are: edges (swSelEDGES) sketches (swSelSKETCHES)

title: IFillSurfaceFeatureData.GetConstraintCurves
description: Gets the constraint curves for this fill-surface feature.

parameters.name: TypeArr
parameters.description: Array of types of entities used to constrain the surface as defined by swSelectType_e ; valid entities are: edges (swSelEDGES) sketches (swSelSKETCHES)

returns: Array of entities used as constraint curves
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
